headline: What Could Shift The CCC Intelligent Solutions WSE CCC Story From Data Moat To Valuation Reset
summary: What the New CCC Price Target Is Really Signaling The tiny move in CCC's fair value estimate from US$181.28 to US$181.31 might look trivial at first glance, but it reflects analysts revisiting their underlying assumptions rather than a wholesale change in the story. A slightly lower discount rate and steady revenue growth inputs align with the view that CCC's data moat and sticky customer base can help keep its cash flow profile relatively resilient in their models. As you read on, focus on...
